result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Pre-trial conference on September 26, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on October 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury status hearing on December 19, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Jury Trial on January 11, 2023 at 09:00 am.

No contact with victim, Walmart, and Co-Defendant, D.C. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

PLEA:  NOT GUILTY.
PO HOLD.

COURT ORDERS: $750 sig  bond - CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s):  Walmart, no contact with co-deft D.C. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
- Prints and photograph. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
